entries.description: SAM: the Toolkit now correctly skips sending '--env-vars' when no environment variables are present in the launch config
SAM/CFN: fix JSON schema path causing a symlink on some operating systems
SAM/CFN JSON schema: schemas now load correctly on first-load
SAM/CFN JSON schema: write yaml.customTags to user-global settings (instead of workspace-local)
SAM Application support for the python3.9 runtime
